item.description:
You are exclusively invited to Collaperty's official launch party at the Vira Boutique on the evening of March 7th! Collaperty is the first social network to offer real estate investors and developers a platform to fund quality investment deals. Join us for a night of networking, live entertainment, prizes, and champagne! All those who RSVP and attend will be entered into the prize raffle. Catered appetizers and drinks will be provided along with a live jazz performance by Brooks Milgate. Limited street parking is available along the Boston Common, and in addition garages which are within walking distance from the venue. Check out our website: www.collaperty.com

Make sure to RSVP here at MassREI.net and also officially register at http://www.eventbrite.com/event/5737914256/
item.name: Collaperty's Official Launch Party
